title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to a StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: This should result in a maximum of one redraw for each visible line.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Enable word wrap mode in a StyledText widget. 2. Append N lines of text to the widget. 3. Observe the number of redraws of the client area.
